name: Shanty Battle
description:
Entry for the first HAW Games Master Game Jam 2020.

The Game Jam Theme was "Sonorous Symphony" so we made a little but full of heart Rhythm Game.

A bunch of Shanty Singers have to stay sane while Sirens are trying to seduce the beardy fellas with their beautiful voices.

Art: Alina.H

Code & Audio: NeoTalon

Code & Animation: Hasgan

Code: Jawah
